item.title: Report Player Help!
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

T0xicsnip3r:

its really confusing… i have a command called ::mark player and after 5 marks it automatically bans them , but i dont suggest this cuz ppl will report for no reason and every1 will ban each other. i suggest it opening an interface and person says why there reporting them then u decide if they get banned or not : s

You’re not actually helping me with my problem, you post a lot on server help and it seems like you’re doing it only for your post counts. Thanks anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Report Player Help!
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

I’m currently adding a report command instead of reporting by the usual interface. I copied the

::ban playername

command and pasted it above the ban command and changed it to

::report playername

So now I have

[i] (Report Player Command)
(Banuser Command)

like that, but when I try the

::report player

command the command tells me invalid user name, how come? Here is my report code.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“report”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(9);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

writeLog(p.playerName, “reported”);
} else {
sM(“The name does not exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to report.”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
